structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. AUTOMATIC TELEPHONE DIALING ALARM SYSTEM

text.section:
Sec. 8A-165. Civil liability.
The Miami-Dade Police Department shall be under no obligation to respond to any message or signal transmitted in violation of of this article and Miami-Dade County, Florida; the Miami-Dade Police Department and its officers, employees and agents, shall not be liable for any failure to respond.
